data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Comoé that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Comoé, Côte d‘Ivoire
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Comoé, Côte d‘Ivoire find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Comoé, Côte d‘Ivoire.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Comoé.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Comoé to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kulango, Bouna people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kulango, Bouna people.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 58,166 who are far from you in Comoé, Côte d‘Ivoire from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Comoé.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Comoé, Côte d‘Ivoire has a population of 84,400.

We estimate Comoé has 8,191 people who might know Jesus, 18,044 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 58,166 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Comoé, Côte d‘Ivoire that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.
